column3: With Nonotta's blessing, we shall bear you to the egg hunting arena on a moment's notice.
When you are ready, I shall escort you to the egg hunting arena. If I may provide any further assistance, do not hestitate to let me know.
In order to continue this quest, you must first participate in Sprig Cleaning and achieve a score of 1 point or higher.
You may learn more about Sprig Cleaning by speaking with the egg usher.
Before participating in Sprig Cleaning, you must cancel any pending Duty Finder registrations or party member recruitments, and withdraw from any party you are currently in.
As your inventory is full, you may be unable to receive all rewards.
Head to the egg hunting arena?
